alerts.desc: The anti-MIME-sniffing header X-Content-Type-Options was not set to 'nosniff'.
alerts.solution: Ensure that the application/web server sets Content-Type appropriately and sets the X-Content-Type-Options header to 'nosniff'.

alerts.alert: Content Security Policy (CSP) Header Not Set
alerts.desc: Content Security Policy is an added layer of security that helps to detect and mitigate certain types of attacks.
alerts.solution: Ensure that your web server, application server, load balancer, etc. is configured to set the Content-Security-Policy header.
